problem_text:
Is the (standard, restricted) wreath product G ≀ H of two finitely generated Hopfian groups Hopfian?
The same question where G is assumed to be abelian or nilpotent is equivalent to Kaplansky’s direct finiteness conjecture; see (H. Bradford, F. Fournier-Facio, Math. Z., 308, no. 4 (2024), Paper no. 58).
H. Bradford, F. Fournier-Facio
